description:
The easiest way to Zip, Unzip and encrypt files for free

IZArc is the easiest way to Zip, Unzip and encrypt files for free
- Zip and Unzip files
- Password protect archives with strong AES encryption
- Support 7-ZIP, RAR, TAR and many other archives
- Added an option in "Configuration/Misc" dialog to disable recent archives history
- Added an option in "Configuration/Misc" dialog to propagate Mark of the Web.
  "Propagate Mark of the Web" option controls assigning the archive Mark of the Web to extracted files.
  The Mark of the Web (MoTW) is a metadata identifier used by Microsoft Windows to mark files downloaded from the Internet as potentially unsafe.

- Removed the option to check the open archive or selected file from archive with VirusTotal
- Some small bug fixes and improvements

- Updated translations
